00035 #define CMS_DAZ_SCENE_EXT           "daz"
00036 #define CMS_DAZ_ASSET_FILE_EXT      "dsf"
00037 #define CMS_DAZ_USER_SCENE_FILE_EXT "duf"

00039 #define CMS_NUM_OF(array_) (sizeof(array_)/sizeof(array_[0]))
00040 
00041 #if defined(Q_OS_WIN) && defined(_DEBUG)
00042 extern "C" __declspec(dllimport) void __stdcall OutputDebugStringA(char const *text);
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 inline void CMSWarning(const char *file, unsigned line, QString const &text)
00046 {
00047     #if defined(Q_OS_WIN) && defined(_DEBUG)
00048 #pragma comment(lib, "kernel32.lib")
00049     QString message = QString("%1(%2): %3\n").arg(file).arg(line).arg(text);
00050     QByteArray messageBytes = message.toAscii();
00051     OutputDebugStringA(messageBytes.constData());
00052 #else
00053     QString fileName = QString::fromLatin1(file);
00054     
00055 #if defined(Q_OS_MAC)
00056     static const QString c_src = QString::fromLatin1("/src/");
00057     int srcIdx = fileName.lastIndexOf(c_src,-1,Qt::CaseInsensitive);
00058     if( srcIdx > 0 ){
00059         fileName = fileName.mid(srcIdx);
00060     }
00061 #endif
00062 
00063     QString message = QString("%1(%2): %3").arg(fileName).arg(line).arg(text);
00064     QByteArray messageBytes = message.toAscii();
00065     qWarning("%s", messageBytes.constData());
00066 #endif
00067 }
00068 #define CMS_WARNING(text_) CMSWarning(__FILE__, __LINE__, text_)
00069 
00070 #if defined( Q_OS_WIN64 ) || defined( Q_OS_MAC64 )
00071 #define DZ_64_BIT
00072 #endif

00074 /*****************************
00075     Required platform abstractions
00076 *****************************/
00077 // Define the things that will handle DLL symbols on Windows platforms.
00078 #if defined( DZ_CMS_NO_EXPORT )
00079 #   define DZ_CMS_EXPORT
00080 #elif defined( Q_OS_WIN )
00081 #   ifdef DZ_CMS_MAKEDLL // Create a DLL library
00082 #       define DZ_CMS_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00083 #   else    // Use a DLL library
00084 #       define DZ_CMS_EXPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00085 #   endif
00086 #elif defined( Q_OS_MAC )
00087 #   ifdef DZ_CMS_MAKEDLL // Create a DLL library
00088 #       define DZ_CMS_EXPORT __attribute__((visibility("default")))
00089 #   else    // Use a DLL library
00090 #       define DZ_CMS_EXPORT
00091 #   endif
00092 #else
00093 #   define DZ_CMS_EXPORT
00094 #endif
